text: los angeles , california alex trebek , the long-time host of the popular television quiz show  jeopardy ,  suffered a minor heart attack at his home monday night . alex trebek has hosted  jeopardy!  for 23 years . trebek , 67 , was recovering at a local hospital , and it was not clear when he would be released , a representative of the show said . he is expected to resume taping the show in january . the representative added that trebek did not have any previous known condition that would have led to the heart attack . trebek , 67 , is a native of sudbury , ontario . he has hosted  jeopardy!  since 1984 . prior to becoming  jeopardy!  host , he served as emcee for a number of game shows , including  high rollers ,   the wizard of odds  and  battlestars .  e-mail to a friend .
